cravingdata.craving: Preference for liquids rather than solids
cravingdata.solution: Flavor water with lemon or lime. You need 8 to 10 glasses per day.

cravingdata.craving: Preference for solids rather than liquids
cravingdata.solution: You have been so dehydrated for so long that you have lost your thirst. Flavor water with lemon or lime. You need 8 to 10 glasses per day.
